data.title: CASS COUNTY DEATH RECORDS
data.text:
DEATH RECORDS - 1867-1960

CASS COUNTY MICHIGAN

Our thank you to the previous web coordinators, Bill and Rita Musgraves, for their diligent work on this index. They were obtained from the Cassopolis Historical Library.

Want to donate a death date for an ancestor? Please quote your source and/or let us know if they are from family files or files found elsewhere.

1960 to 1990's is at the bottom of the page.

Thank you. Drop us an email at cassmichigangen@yahoo.com

Also see Michigan Gendis system for more recorded deaths for this county.
